arts.ttl: Ilyas Ansah debut double helps Union Berlin edge Stuttgart
arts.sum: Ilyas Ansah scored twice on his Bundesliga debut to help Union Berlin defeat VfB Stuttgart 2-1 at the Stadion an der Alten Försterei in their opening game of the league campaign. Union boss Steffen Baumgart handed a league debut to summer signing Ansah, while Stuttgart coach Sebastian Hoeneß fielded an attacking trio of Nick Woltemade, Ermedin Demirović and Deniz Undav .

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs. VfB Stuttgart preview: Union look for strong start against Pokal winners
arts.sum: Union Berlin host VfB Stuttgart to open their 2025/26 Bundesliga campaign.
